enb_long_title: UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) Workshop on Technology Needs Assessments
sentences: Chair Kumarsingh presented a summary of the workshop findings, emphasizing the utility of the workshop and thanking participants.

He stated that participants had helped to: deepen understandings of experiences and lessons from conducting TNAs; gather insights on further needs and actions to pass on to Parties to assist in further implementing of TNAs; and enhance understanding of possible roles of TNAs in enhanced action on technology transfer for mitigation and adaptation.
The Secretariat thanked participants and presenters and the workshop concluded at 5:17 pm.
